Convo: ^You should take a seat, man. These hay bales are pretty comfy once you get past the poking feeling on your tail end.

c-0: ^Uhh, no thanks. I'd prefer not to deal with that.
c-1: ^If it's poking you, then why are you sitting on it? There are other places to sit, or even stand.

C1: ^Fair enough. We really should have brought some more stuff with us to avoid this. Wasn't this place supposed to be...

c-0: ^It was supposed to be. That's what the Cricetto's told me when I asked them about using it.
^Well they clearly lied to you about it.
^Just keep that in mind in case there's a next time.
c-1: ^Yeah, yeah. No need to tell me. Let's just try and make do with what we can for now. Deal?
^I'm cool with that. Just gotta keep it out of my mouth and eyes while playing, but I can manage that.

C2: ^Dunno. It looked soft so I went for it, but once I realized that it wasn't actually soft, I was already on it. I just didn't feel like moving.

c-0: ^That makes sense. I guess. I probably wouldn't want to get back up after just sitting down either.
^Glad you understand bro. I can manage until it's time to get back out there, so don't worry about me.
c-1: ^Well this intermission isn't going to last forever you know? You're gonna need to move regardless here in a bit.
